channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for VT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for VT

item.title: Report E-2024080213
item.description:
Report E-2024080213

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-22T18:16:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-15
  • City: FERRISBURG
  • State: VT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: KAG MERCHANT GAS GROUP, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 1
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 735000
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: The KAG Merchant Gas Group, LLC unit was traveling on Route 7 in Ferrisburgh, Vermont. It is suspected that a fire started in one of the rear wheels on the tractor that quickly spread to the trailer. Due to the fire and heat, the trailer began to vent the natural gas it was holding. The local fire department was eventually able extinguish the fire. The tractor and trailer suffered significant damage as a result of the fire.
